Author: iCumulate
Title: iCumulate (ICU) Multifunctional social investment platform | ICO CANCELLED
Body: Our thanks to everybody for their interest in the iCumulate project. As it has already been mentioned in medium, twitter, telegram and website channels, Due to the subdued crypto currency climate and resulting insufficient interest in the presale event, the iCumulate main token sale and project has now been cancelled. There are no plans to continue.  The iCumulate Team

Author: iCumulatecrowd
Title: iCumulate (ICU) Multifunctional social investment platform | ICO CANCELLED
Body: iCumulate is not a cryptocurrency exchange like Coinbase or KuCoin.  The iCumulate ecosystem is a multifunctional investment platform bringing like-minded investors and traders together into one social environment. Users will have access to all of the tools and information they need to build their own portfolios of fiat products and crypto currencies/assets, without the hassles, complications and drawbacks of owning the underlying asset tokens. The platform will evolve into an ecosystem whereby traders, investors and content providers all come together in one place.  The iCumulate token (ICU) is a utility token and will serve many functions on the platform and become an intrinsic part of the trading and investing ecosystem. Holding or spending tokens on the platform creates many benefits to the users.  For more information on the platform and token use please see the whitepaper here: https://www.icumulate.io/Documents/Whitepaper.pdf You can also check out our demo here: https://www.icumulate.io/demo1.0/demoindex.html or view our video explaining the project here: https://youtu.be/gYKjZxDPbSQ

Title: iCumulate (ICU) Multifunctional social investment platform | ICO CANCELLED

Author: muarip
Title: iCumulate (ICU) Multifunctional social investment platform | ICO CANCELLED
Body: They should have taken this step but you should ask the telegram group of this project to be more sure of it. All projects are more active in telegram groups to convey the information you need.

Author: iCumulatecrowd
Title: iCumulate (ICU) Multifunctional social investment platform | ICO CANCELLED
Body: Steps iCumulate took to ensure scammers will not be able to mislead investors into sending funds to the wrong address:  1. We published our contract address before the sale began: https://medium.com/@icumulate/the-icumulate-token-sale-smart-contract-address-570dffdb48b6 2. This is the official contract address by the way: https://etherscan.io/address/0x9cb22d847750eaa06de1fb64cc87ce10a9d41b48 3. In order to contribute to the crowdsale you must register on the website here https://ico.icumulate.io/ 4. You then must fill out, submit, and pass KYC before you can contribute to the crowdfund. 5. We are also taking the customary precautions to pin warning messages, and repeat them. Begging people to ignore random DM and posts asking for funds to be sent to a random address. 6. We also delete any such fake posts immediately, and report all individuals who make them.

Author: iCumulatecrowd
Title: iCumulate (ICU) Multifunctional social investment platform | ICO CANCELLED
Body: Did you know iCumulate will have a referral program? With our referral program, the Referrer (person sharing their link) will receive a 5% token reward, and the Referral (person using the link to contribute) will receive 2% additional tokens! Note: The Referrer is not required to contribute, but must sign up on the website and pass KYC. A referral link will then be provided. The Referral must use the Referrer's link to sign up and pass KYC, and then contribute, for the Referral to count. The Referral system will be available on the ICO Cabinet which will open on the website at https://www.icumulate.io/ late on Monday November 26th. There are up to 35M tokens for grabs for successful referrals! More information coming soon! http://icumulate.io  http://i64.tinypic.com/npjrqt.png

Author: iCumulatecrowd
Title: iCumulate (ICU) Multifunctional social investment platform | ICO CANCELLED
Body: In order to ensure maximum liquidity for ICU token holders, we intend to list ICU on other large exchanges. Therefore we are actively talking to established venues but cannot comment on timings at this time. We will also be listing ICU on the iCumulate platform once fully operational, providing an additional liquidity source to the market.
